item.description:
Good Morning Everyone,

Hope this email finds you well and that you are enjoying this long weekend!

Here's another Viva Italia MeetUp idea - Keep the ideas coming!

ITALIAN AMERICAN RECONCILIATION
Love-Struck Comedy by John Patrick Shanley

Huey loves his ex-wife Janice... maybe. Teresa loves Huey... for the time being. Janice hates her father... but he's dead. Aunt May thinks minestrone soup can cure all problems... it can't. It's hot in Little Italy in the summer... so what's new. Aldo loves his friend Huey... in a manly way. What's a man to do? Reconciliation!

Tickets are $18 per person or $13 per person if we can get 20 or more in the door.

Go to www.nbrep.org for more info.
item.name: Italian American Reconciliation - Theatre Sat 9/29
